Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan will take on India in the Super 8 Group 1 match of the T20 World Cup 2024 at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados.
India will be coming into this match after topping the Group A standings in the league stage with three wins and one no result.
Afghanistan finished at second place in Group C standings to seal the Super 8 spot.
The pitch at the Kensington Oval has provided assistance to the fast bowlers and spinners alike, with an average first innings score of 154.
Afghanistan have drubbed the likes of Uganda, New Zealand, and Papua New Guinea in their first three wins at the T20 World Cup 2024.
West Indies overpowered Afghanistan's spin attack, handing them a 104-run defeat in St Lucia.
Top performers for Afghanistan include Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Ibrahim Zadran, Gulbadin Naib, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Naveen-ul-Haq, and captain Rashid Khan.
Top performers for India in the tournament are Rohit Sharma, Rishabh Pant, Suryakumar Yadav, Hardik Pandya, Arshdeep Singh, and Jasprit Bumrah.
Virat Kohli, one of the top scorers in T20 World Cups, is yet to go out all guns blazing.
Team India, who are yet to lose a match at the ongoing T20 World Cup 2024, will be the favourites to get the better of Afghanistan despite a neck-and-neck battle.
